Business Intelligence Consulting

"Data is what you need to do analytics. Information is what you need to do business."
– John Owen

Based in Pretoria, South Africa, we specialize in building business intelligent (BI) Solutions for the automotive industry. Extracting data from Autoline into a Microsoft SQL Server and providing assorted services on top of that extraction. Our client solutions perform the following:

  • Automated triggers to provide dashboards with real time generated information.
  • Condition based SMS functions which increased customer satisfaction
  • Nation-wide, integrated security that can be dynamically modified by the administrator
  • Much more!

Our expertise however does not stop at automotive, as our solutions have been implemented in multiple other sectors,

Business Data Integration

Data integration and related practices add value to data, which in turn increases the value of the business processes that use the data.

Using a combination of Microsoft SSIS & Microsoft SQL Server procedures, we take data residing in different sources and combine them into one system. This allows our users to have a single point of view of their data.

Our solutions assist with effective decision making depending on aggregated, calculated, and time-series data values in a data warehouse—data and data structures derived from data integration. Our business practices such as operational BI or just-in-time inventory provides a data integration solution that can operate in real time or close to it (depending on the client data structures).

Software Application Development

The team follows an agile systems development life cycle to optimise the development outputs

Using multiple technologies, we provide our users with custom developed Web & Desktop applications to suite their individual business needs

Continuous integration is provided as a value and continuous deployment can be integrated into the SLA

Business Data Reporting

"The goal is to turn data into information, and information into insight." – Carly Fiorina, former executive, president, and chair of Hewlett-Packard Co.

Our solutions provide real-time results by aggregating and extracting value from all the data clients collected, otherwise known as your key performance indicators (KPIs). Simplifying them into more manageable chunks of visual information that allows you to see what you are doing right and where you need to improve. Our dashboards assist informed decision making that dramatically impact your business performance – which in turn effects your bottom line.

Using Microsoft SSRS, Power BI and QlikView we are able to generate any report based on the user requirements. Be it simple or Complex.

Want to find out more?

These are but some of the solutions provided. Don't see the requirement you are looking for? Please contact us so we can find the perfect solution for you.
